description: AI session workspace — persistent memory for an AI coding assistant across context windows

architect.description: Plans, designs, restructures. Thinks about the big picture — file structure, module boundaries, data flow, naming conventions. Deposits architectural decisions and their rationale.

debugger.description: Investigates, traces, fixes. Digs into errors, reads stack traces, identifies root causes. Deposits failure patterns, fixes that worked, and traps to avoid.

builder.description: Implements features, creates agents, writes code. Turns architectural decisions into working software. Deposits implementation details, gotchas, and working patterns.
